A TYPICAL MFF DAY

Tell us your goals and we’ll help you setup the perfect day.

BREAKFAST

Fit Griddle

You’ve been fasting for 8 hours, your body is hungry. Fuel it and kick start your metabolism for the day by Break’n the Fast, with quality protein, carbs n' fats.

SNACK

MACADAMIA NUT PROTEIN COOKIE

Snack between breakfast and lunch to stay full and energized. This may help keep your blood sugar and energy levels stable.

LUNCH

SALMON MEAL

Our lunches are fueled with lean protein, low-glycemic carbohydrates, veggies, and antioxidant-rich spices to keep your energy high during the day.

This can help keep the afternoon hunger monster at bay.

SNACK

CHICKEN SNACK TACOS

The after-lunch slump disappears as you enjoy our balanced snacks. Eating frequently may help boost your metabolism, burn fat and keep you energized throughout the day.

DINNER

CAVEMAN STEAK

Our low-carb dinners are loaded with lean protein and fresh veggies. Why? Skipping carbs before bed may help you sleep better and can help prevent body fat storage.
